start:
🧔 *Welcome to BeardNFT Bot!*
Your personal assistant for tracking XRP NFTs in real time.

This bot notifies you instantly when your NFTs on XRP.Cafe are:

💰 Sold
🏷️ Listed
🤝 Offered
✨ Minted
🔥 Burned

You can:
• Track one or multiple NFT collections
• Get notifications in groups, channels, or DMs
• Filter events by marketplace (XRP.Cafe only)
• Choose your language preference

To get started, use /track <collection_id or link> or tap the Track button.

Need help? Use /help anytime.
help:
ℹ️ *How to use BeardNFT Bot*

1) Use /track <collection_id or link> — Start tracking a collection.
2) Use /list — Show collections you are tracking.
3) Use /stop — Stop all tracking for this chat.
4) Use /language <code> — Change bot language for your chat.

Supported language codes: en, id, fr, de, es, ru, ja, zh
stop: 🛑 All tracking stopped for this chat.
noList: ❌ You are not tracking any collection yet.
